t: Psalm 59
Prayer for Deliverance from Enemies.
For the choir director; set to Al-tashheth. A Mikhtam of David, when Saul sent men and they watched the house in order to kill him.
Deliver*pn me from my enemies, O my God; Set*ln me securely*i on high away from those who rise up against me.
Deliver*ln me from those who do iniquity And*ln save me from men of bloodshed.
For*ln behold, they have set an ambush for my life; Fierce*ln men launch an attack against me, Not*ln for my transgression nor for my sin, O Lord,*s
For*ln no guilt of mine,*i they run and set themselves against me. Arouse*ln Yourself to help me, and see!
You,*ln O Lord*s God of hosts, the God of Israel, Awake*ln to punish all the nations; Do*ln not be gracious to any who*i are*i treacherous in iniquity. Selah.
They*ln return at evening, they howl like a dog, And*ln go around the city.
Behold,*ln they belch forth with their mouth; Swords*ln are in their lips, For,*ln they*i say,*i “Who hears?”
But*ln You, O Lord,*s laugh at them; You*ln scoff at all the nations.
Because*iln of*i his strength I will watch for You, For*ln God is my stronghold.
My*ln God in His lovingkindness will meet me; God*ln will let me look triumphantly*i upon my foes.
Do*ln not slay them, or my people will forget; Scatter*ln them by Your power, and bring them down, O*ln Lord, our shield.
On*iln account*i of*i the sin of their mouth and*i the words of their lips, Let*ln them even be caught in their pride, And*ln on account of curses and lies which they utter.
Destroy*ln them*i in wrath, destroy them*i that they may be no more; That*ln men*i may know that God rules in Jacob To*ln the ends of the earth. Selah.
They*ln return at evening, they howl like a dog, And*ln go around the city.
They*ln wander about for food And*ln growl if they are not satisfied.
But*ln as for me, I shall sing of Your strength; Yes,*ln I shall joyfully sing of Your lovingkindness in the morning, For*ln You have been my stronghold And*ln a refuge in the day of my distress.
O*ln my strength, I will sing praises to You; For*ln God is my stronghold, the God who shows me lovingkindness.
